lands: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley

menuItems.land: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
menuItems.name: Fish and Chips
menuItems.description: Fresh North Atlantic cod, battered and fried, served with chips and tartar sauce.

menuItems.name: Bangers and Mash
menuItems.description: Grilled English sausages with mashed potatoes, saut√©ed onions, and gravy.

menuItems.name: Beef, Lamb & Guinness Stew
menuItems.description: Hearty stew served in a warm, crusty bread bowl.

menuItems.land: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
menuItems.name: Shepherd's Pie
menuItems.description: Ground beef and vegetables crowned with mashed potatoes, served with roasted root vegetables.

menuItems.land: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
menuItems.name: Hunter's Chicken
menuItems.description: Bacon wrapped chicken breast with BBQ gravy, Monterey & Cheddar cheese blend, English minted peas, pea tendrils and chips.

menuItems.land: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
menuItems.name: Vegan Curry
menuItems.description: Plant-based chick'n and potatoes in a rich curry sauce, served with pita bread and a fresh garden salad.

menuItems.land: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
menuItems.name: Butterbeer
menuItems.description: Signature butterscotch-flavored beverage, available hot or cold.

menuItems.land: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley
menuItems.name: Butterbeer Ice Cream
menuItems.description: Soft-serve ice cream with butterscotch flavor in a waffle cone.

menuItems.name: Krusty Burger
menuItems.description: 1/3 lb. burger with secret sauce, cheddar cheese sauce, giant tomato slice, iceberg lettuce on a specialty bun, served with kurly fries.

menuItems.name: Clogger Burger
menuItems.description: 2/3 lb. burger with applewood smoked bacon, secret sauce, cheddar cheese sauce, giant tomato slice and iceberg lettuce on a specialty bun, served with kurly fries.

menuItems.name: Mother Nature Burger
menuItems.description: 6-ounce black bean burger with guacamole and tomato.

menuItems.name: Sideshow Bob Foot Long
menuItems.description: Foot-long all-beef hot dog with chili cheese and onions.

menuItems.name: Fried Shrimp Platter
menuItems.description: Crispy fried shrimp served with fries and cocktail sauce.

menuItems.name: Fried Fish Platter
menuItems.description: Battered and fried fish served with fries and tartar sauce.

menuItems.name: Chicken and Waffle Sandwich
menuItems.description: Fried chicken breast served between two waffle buns with maple mayo.

menuItems.name: Personal Pizza
menuItems.description: Individual-sized pizza with choice of cheese, pepperoni, or meat lover's toppings.

menuItems.name: Asian Chicken Salad
menuItems.description: Mixed greens with grilled chicken, mandarin oranges, crispy wontons, and Asian sesame dressing.

menuItems.name: Mel's Famous Burger
menuItems.description: Beef patty with cheddar cheese, pickles, secret sauce, lettuce, and tomato on a toasted sesame seed bun, served with fries.

menuItems.name: Big Bopper Burger
menuItems.description: Beef patty with cheddar cheese, bacon strips and onion rings topped with barbecue sauce, served with fries.

menuItems.name: Crispy Chicken Fingers
menuItems.description: Flash fried chicken fingers served with choice of dipping sauce and fries.

menuItems.name: Crispy Buffalo Bacon Sandwich
menuItems.description: Crispy chicken breast tossed in Buffalo sauce, bacon, lettuce and tomato on a sesame bun with avocado ranch dressing.

menuItems.name: Vegan Field Roast Chili Dog
menuItems.description: Vegan hot dog with three bean chili, lentils, hominy, chopped onions and vegan cheddar cheese on a poppyseed bun.

menuItems.name: California Cobb Grilled Chicken Salad
menuItems.description: Lettuce, applewood smoked bacon, grilled chicken breast, green onions, egg, tomato, blue cheese crumbles, and avocado ranch dressing.

menuItems.name: Classic Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Beef patty with American cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a toasted bun, served with fries.

menuItems.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

menuItems.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
menuItems.description: Sliced turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted sourdough bread.

menuItems.name: Cheese Pizza
menuItems.description: Personal-sized pizza with mozzarella cheese and marinara sauce.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
menuItems.description: Spaghetti pasta with marinara sauce and Italian meatballs.

menuItems.name: Chicken Parmigiana
menuItems.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, served with spaghetti.

menuItems.name: Chicken Burrito
menuItems.description: Flour tortilla filled with seasoned chicken, rice, beans, cheese, and pico de gallo.

menuItems.name: Grilled Chicken BLT Sandwich
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken breast with bacon, lettuce, and tomato on artisan bread.
